name: Introduction to Media Studies
description: This course introduces students to the field of media studies. Topics include media theory, media production, media history, and media analysis.

name: Mass Media and Society
description: This course examines the role of mass media in society and how the media shapes public attitudes and behaviors. Topics include media influence and media law.

name: Media Management
description: This course focuses on the management of media organizations. Topics include media finance, media marketing, media planning, and media policy.

name: Advanced Media Management
description: This course is an advanced look at the management of media organizations. Topics include media economics, media strategy, media ethics, and media governance.
